title: ExecGQL
description: Retrieves and/or sets attribute values for specified nodes.

nodes.description: A list of GQL paths or DBIDs to resolve.

get.description: A list of GQL expressions to evaluate for each node.

set.description: A list of GQL expressions to evaluate and then set to the corresponding value.

expression.description: A GQL expression to evaluate for each node.

value.description: The value to set the result of the expression to.

fieldAccess.description: If true, information may be retrieved from devices in the field. It is suggested to leave this false unless you need it.

contextDBID.description: GQL paths in the `nodes` property will be resolved relative to this node. If omitted, paths will be resolved relative to the root of the geo tree.
